parameter.name: deleteAfterRetrieve
parameter.description: Whether the email should be deleted after retrieving

parameter.name: receivedSince
parameter.description: The date after which to retrieve received emails

parameter.name: receivedUntil
parameter.description: The date until which to retrieve received emails

parameter.name: sentSince
parameter.description: The date after which to retrieve sent emails

parameter.name: sentUntil
parameter.description: The date until which to retrieve sent emails

parameter.name: subjectRegex
parameter.description: Subject Regex to match with the wanted emails

parameter.name: fromRegex
parameter.description: From email address to match with the wanted emails

parameter.name: seen
parameter.description: Whether to retrieve 'seen' or 'not seen' emails

parameter.name: deleted
parameter.description: Whether to retrieve 'deleted' or 'not deleted' emails

parameter.name: offset
parameter.description: The index from which to retrieve emails

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The number of emails to be retrieved

parameter.name: folder
parameter.description: Name of the Mailbox folder to retrieve emails from
